location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

physicalDescription.extent: Materials: Printed in colour on paper.Dimensions: 522 x 417mm, on sheet 585 x 503mm.

mods.abstract: Plan of the British naval base at Khor Kaliya [Khawr al Qulayâ€˜ah], Bahrain. The plan indicates roads, vegetation, buildings and landmarks. Included is a table of reference for symbols used in the plan.Includes the following printing statement: 'Produced under the Superintendence of Rear-Admiral J.A.Edgell, C.B., O.B.E., Hydrographer.' Prepared by naval staff in the Admiralty's Naval Intelligence Division.
